DESCRIPTIONS: Collect !N! to activate
All negative status effects inflicted by enemies are converted into Strength

At the start of combat: Gain !M! Ritual
Resets at the start of combat:
Negate one fatal blow and remove all negative status effects

Increases the amount of gold found
Each collection increases gold gain by !M2! %
Each additional collection grants an extra gold drop after combat
Each additional collection also grants !M! max HP when acquiring gold (can trigger up to !C! times per room)

RelicCombo:ChallengeMe.NAME: Combo: Challenge Me

At the start of combat: if fighting a powerful enemy
Draw !M2! additional cards at the start of each turn

Each collection increases damage dealt to enemies by !M! %

Gain !M3! [E] and draw until your hand is full
